welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Wangen im Allgau, a charming city nestled in the heart of the Allgau region known for its picturesque scenery and rich cultural heritage. We invite you to explore our beautiful city and immerse yourself in its unique charm. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Friedrichshafen Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for charter and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
